title: (x) The Touring Cyclist fat serif face - Caslon Black {Yves}
content:
Good afternoon!

I have a logo typeface I need identified. Due to the close kerning, WhatTheFont didn’t work. I’m hoping this is an easy one I just don’t recognize, as I need it quickly.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/TradeInTCLogo_5009.gif)
author: engelhardt

comments.content:
See, I knew it was simple. :)

Many thanks, Yves!
